body.name: Battery Powered Fan - 9-Inch Rechargeable Fan Portable, 20000mAh(60Hrs) Camping Fan for Tent, Auto Oscillation Cordless Fan, Tent Fan for Camping with Remote/light, 4 Speeds, 4 Timing, Outdoor
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 5 hrs 22 mins
features: 20000MAH BATTERY POWERED FAN: This portable fan battery operated is equipped with a 20000mAh rechargeable battery with a working time of 15h-25h-40h-60h and four adjustable speeds, Allowing you to stay cool for a long time, In addition, The fan battery operated is equipped with Type-C input/output and USB output port, Which is convenient for charging the cordless fan, Making it a great choice for camping trips, Power outages, Hurricanes, Etc.

RECHARGEABLE FAN CAMPING & SHAKING & REMOTE:This battery powered fan for camping has 90° or 45° automatic swing, 270° swivel head, which can be rotated at will to improve comfort. In addition, the portable fan for camping is equipped with a remote control, so you can easily control the fan with the remote control or buttons within 26 feet. The remote control can be stored in the slot on the side of the base to avoid loss. Note: Please remove the insulating strip on the remote control before use.

USB FAN CAMPING & SLEEP TIMER: This fan camping has a sleep timer to help you set the working time, The battery operated fan camping doesn't have to run all day or all night (can be timed to 1H, 2H, 4H, 8H), Also you can set the sleep mode will turn off all the lights to help keep it dark and better sleep, Thanks to its powerful and super quiet feature, This portable battery fan runs with the lowest white noise (<28db) Let you get maximum comfort.

PORTABLE CAMPING FAN WITH Light & Hook: This camping fan battery powered offers 12 LED beads, 3 dimmable brightness functions for different occasions. Great portable fan for bedroom, Office, Camping, RV, Power Outage, Rtc. The 2-in-1 powered fan for camping has a 360° rotating hidden hook so you can hang the fan up and adjust the right angle. In addition, it is also suitable for use indoors as a large battery operated fan. This would be a great gift for your family and friends.
WARRANTY & AFTER-SALES SERVICE: If you have any questions about this, Please contact us, We will respond quickly within 24hours to answer related questions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Remote Control & Automatic Rotating This battery operated fan has 90° or 45° automatic swing, 270° swivel head, which can be rotated at will to improve comfort. In addition, within the range of 26 inches, you can use the equipped remote control to control the fan. Wind Speed & Timing Settings This is a tent fan with a timer, which can be set to 1H, 2H, 4H, 8H. This fan also has four levels of wind speed. You can choose different wind speeds and timings according to your needs to meet your needs. Rechargeable & PORTABLE This battery-operated fan for camping is equipped with a rechargeable battery and has Type-C in/out and USB-out ports for conveniently charging the fan while also powering your phone.

Hanging Design There is a hidden hook at the bottom of the fan, which can be rotated 90° for hanging the fan, suitable for camping, RV and other places. Three Brightness This fan has LED lights and can adjust the brightness. There are three different brightness levels: Low, Mid, and High, which can be applied to different occasions and meet different needs. Plus Size Compared with ordinary fans, this fan is larger in size, with a fan surface of 9 inches, an overall length of 9.05 inches, a width of 4.1 inches, and a height of 10.6 inches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The fan is designed to be versatile and convenient to use. It can be placed on a flat surface, allowing it to stand steadily on a table or any other stable platform. Additionally, it features a built-in hook in the base, which allows me to hang it upside down, making it ideal for hanging inside a tent or other suitable areas.What sets this fan apart is its flexibility in directing airflow. The fan oscillates left to right, offering a range of motion between 45 degrees to 90 degrees, ensuring that the breeze is evenly distributed across the space. Moreover, the fan head can be swiveled up and down, allowing me to adjust the airflow direction according to my preference or to cool specific areas.The Orteen rechargeable portable fan has become an essential companion during camping trips and picnics on hot days. Its portability, combined with its long-lasting battery life, ensures that I stay cool and comfortable wherever I go. I no longer have to rely on the availability of power outlets or worry about tangled cords.The fan's compact size and lightweight design make it easy to carry in my bag or backpack. It has become a reliable companion that provides much-needed relief from the heat when I'm out in nature or enjoying outdoor activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great rechargeable fan
reviews.reviewText: I bought this fan to take to work. My workplace lost the main a/c unit and can not get another one until fall. I had another battery operated fan, but the battery would die long before the end of my shift, so I was excited to find this fan with 20,000mah battery. The fan itself is smaller than 9", but does throw a lot of air for the size. It is sturdy enough to set on a small table without being unstable, even when oscillating (which was a problem with my other fan). The battery will last all day (8+ hours) on the highest setting. It does, however, take a long time to fully charge, even with a fast charge cable. I have received many compliments about this fan from my coworkers. Because it is battery powered, I can place it anywhere I need to and not be limited by where the nearest power outlet is located. If necessary, I can take a battery bank and plug it into the back of the unit to give it a boost. It has been a literal lifesaver this summer when temperatures have been over 90°+. Excess temps don't seem to wear the battery down sooner than expected either, although I am unsure of how well it will last over time.Edit: I have now used this fan for 9 months, and it's still going strong. Still lasts through an 8 hour shift, still getting compliments from co-workers. Worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased one of these fans in the summer for myself. Record heat but still wanted to enjoy sitting outside in the evening until it turned dark. This fan ticks all of the buttons. HUGE battery, able to charge my electronics while reading outside from the fan. It oscillates or not, 4 levels of speed, 3 light levels, can set for up to 8 hours. Lovely remote that sits in a groove on the fan body. My neighbor saw it and liked the features. Problem solved on his Christmas gift. Gave it to him early when it arrived in perfect condition yesterday evening. He charged it and loves it! Thank you for a quality product and fast shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing little thing
reviews.reviewText: The battery life on this feller is amazing! I've used it non-stop on fan mode at 2 for 2 days and it only got to 50% battery power.I used it to help me start my fire while camping. It's a great camp light, awesome white noise fan/fire starter, it hangs, its stands, it rotates, and it has timer. It's an amazing little product. Yes you can charge your phone from it but you won't get days and days of awesome fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small, but feels good for size
reviews.reviewText: Ok, so this fan is marketed as a 9 inch fan. The fan housing is about 7 inches only, the fan blades are about 5 inches in diameter. The only thing that equals 9 inches is the total width of the fan unit including the side supports. So far, this the only downside I have noticed. I have not actually used it much yet except briefly after unboxing. The led light is pretty bright, the breeze on level 4 feels pretty good for its size. I'm curious how the battery will hold up, I may edit my review after I use it awhile. One neat feature is you can set this fan to oscillate at either 90 degrees or at 45 degrees. That being said, overall I feel that this fan is a good buy so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I anticipated!
reviews.reviewText: I got really sick and ended up in the hospital a couple of months ago due to the heat. So we invested in2 of these 20000 amp fans in orange. At the time they were $42.99. We thought it would be worth the investment b\c of how sick I got from dehydration despite the things I did to combat it. I have waited to write a review until I used them for a while to make sure I could write a review based on more than one use. These fans have been amazing! We ended up getting a 3rd one as well. They last all weekend at my market events and I have recommended them to several people b\c they thought they were so good! They do take about 12 hours to charge when on about 25% so we charge them overnight when they need it. That was the one negative I read about these but honestly itye fan lasts for like 12-15 hours and I run them on high speed, use the light and often the charging port in the back and they STILL last! These are great and I highly recommend them! I am finally able to do my markets without getting sick! Most of them are outside and we need to stay cool and light things up for evening markets. The charging time doesn't bother me at all b\c they battery lasts so long. I've never written such a long review but I really do back this product and wanted to do it justice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS FAN - Great investment!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Take it on my kayak with me on the pond! Nice breeze while I'm paddling around! Take it to the moto cross track, keeps cool there, sitting on the bleachers for hours. Hang it up from the top of the golf cart at the beach, nice fan riding around the campground. Has a very bright light and lasts a long time. I'm very pleased with it and glad I bought it. Would highly recommend and would buy another if I needed to or for someone for a gift. No regrets! Would be great in a tent I would think, I also keep it on my nightstand, on low it's a nice lil breeze at night.

Overall very impressed with this little fan. I use it camping and it’s great. Highly recommend. Only complaint would be the price of $100+ but in the end it’s worth it since it’s last a long time, is lighter than other fans and the remote/buttons feel better than other models
